name: Psycho Limos
description: We all have all played some great and not so great games in our day. I thought it would be an interesting challenge to make something of a spiritual successor to a cult classic game from the library of Sega Genesis. So as my very first project, here is the PC (and eventually Mac) release of Psycho Limos.  I hope you all have a good time in which ever way you do with this game.  Support my new hobby by downloading, sharing and having a good time experiencing the psychopathic fun in your limousine.
